recipes.title: Veggie Stew (Oven)
recipes.method: 1) Pre-heat the oven to 200C. 2) Place carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. 3) Add rest of the ingredients and mix well. 4) Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 5) Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 6) Serve with a slaw of your choice.

recipes.title: Pizza (Oven)
recipes.method: 1) Pre-heat the oven to 200C. 2) Add pasta, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. 3) Cook in the oven for 30 minutes. 4) Serve with a slaw of your choice.

recipes.title: Roast Chicken (Air-Fryer)
recipes.method: 1) Take Costco's rotisserie chicken out of your fridge. 2) Cut the chicken into pieces. 3) Air fry the chicken pieces at 400F for 5 minutes (skin-side up in a single layer).

recipes.title: Steamed Cabbage (Microwave)
recipes.method: 1) Cut the cabbage into slices. 2) Place the sliced cabbage in a microwave-safe bowl. 3) Add 1/4 inch of water. 4) Cover and microwave on high for 8 minutes. 5) Drain the water from the bowl. 5) Add salt and sesame oil.
